short_summary: Disposal of a barge in Chester Basin, NS
description: Barge demolition & disposal in Chester Basin, NS
full_summary:
================

### Government Tender Announcement
#### Removal and Disposal of Barge in Chester Basin, Nova Scotia

#### Notice Title:
T2012-230012 Removal and Disposal of Barge - Chester Basin NS

#### Main Requirements:
Transport Canada is seeking a contractor to dispose of a 23m steel barge located at Chester Basin, Nova Scotia, through demolition and disposal.

#### Project Details:

* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4104238423
* **Publication Date:** July 18, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** August 17, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** September 6, 2023

#### Multi-Modal Categories:

* Commercial marine craft
* Coastal and transoceanic water vessel salvage and refloating service

#### Trade Agreements:

This tender opportunity is open to companies who are responsive to the following trade agreements: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA).

#### Contact Details:
Please refer to the contact information below to get in touch with the contracting agency about this tender notice.

* Quentin Crocker, Contracting Officer
* Phone: [Not Available]
* Email: [quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:quentin.crocker@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL:
The tender description is available through the following link: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16907502>

#### Document Availability:
This notice is available on the Supply and Services Section of the PSPC Buying and Selling website.

#### Confirmatory Document:
Please refer to the solicitation document WS4104238423 for more information about the project, timelines, and other details.
